roleset.name: to attack or challenge in argument

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result , says [0] [*T*-2]Mr. Geiger , lawyers think twice before [*-3] appealing a judge 's ruling , are reluctant [*-3] to mount [*RNR*] , or even support [*RNR*] , challenges against him for re-election and are usually loath [*-3] to file complaints that [*T*63] might impugn a judge 's integrity .

roleset.note: IMPUGN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impugn' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from impugn.01-v predicate notes)
